title: Looking to Join a Team
body: I want to join a team that will be my main team and i will be dedicated to this team i will a play when ever i can i play Mid and my second role is Jungle Add me Cuddle Bear if you are intrested in having me in your team i am currently Plat 5 aswell

replies.body: Hi man added you in game, recently started a team, looking to have you as a JG/mid in that order. we are currently a semi serious team looking to get better as a team and get up to hopefully gold bys easons end
